targets.expr: sum(100 * irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}[30s])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)

sum(100 * container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", resource="memory"}) by (pod)

sum(100 * irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}[30s])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)

sum(100 * container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", resource="memory"}) by (pod)
